awards.title: Second Place Award in LSVOS Challenge
awards.awarder: 6th  Large-scale Video Object Segmentation Challenge (LSVOS), ECCV2024
awards.summary: LSVOS is the prestigious competition held regularly in conjunction with top-tier computer vision conferences. Focused on advancing the state of the art in video object segmentation, the challenge encourages innovative solutions to address the problem in large scale dataset. Previous challenge results can be found here.
